channel.title: 1975 Referendum on Join EU
channel.description: Recent content in 1975 Referendum on Join EU

item.title: Reasons for joining and staying in EEC
item.description: On joining EEC Ted Heath makes clear in December 1972 that we are joining something that is far more than a common market. On staying in EEC Margaret Thatcher in 1975, on the illusion that we could regain sovereignty by leaving the European Community.
